org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate

Class AbstractSessionCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.impl.ChainImpl
      • org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate.AbstractSessionCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xchain.Chain, org.xchain.Command
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeleteCommand, GetCommand, PersistCommand, QueryCommand, SaveCommand

    public abstract class AbstractSessionCommand
extends org.xchain.impl.ChainImpl
    Base session command class. All commands which run within a context of a session should extend this class.
    Author:
    Mike Moulton, Devon Tackett, Christian Trimble
    See Also:
    Session
